溳字的基本解释

溳
yún
见“涢”。

溳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yún］
［《廣韻》王分切，平文，云。］
“涢1”的繁体字。
水名。汉江支流。源出湖北省大洪山，北流绕随州市折向南，经安陆市至武汉市西入汉水。
[②]［yǔn］
［《廣韻》于敏切，上軫，云。］
“涢2”的繁体字。
见“濜2溳”。

溳字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　溳； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页641第01
【唐韻】【集韻】?王分切，音雲。水名。【水經注】溳水，出蔡陽縣東南大洪山。　又州名。【廣輿記】德安府，春秋爲鄖子國，後周曰溳州。　又【廣韻】于敏切【集韻】【韻會】羽敏切，?音隕。濜溳，波相次也。【郭璞·江賦】溭淢濜溳。

涢
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yún］
["Guangyun" Wang divided cut, plain text, cloud. ]
Traditional characters for "涢1".
Water name. A tributary of the Han River. It originates from Dahong Mountain in Hubei Province, flows northward around Suizhou City and turns southward, passing through Anlu City to Wuhan City and entering Hanshui River in the west.
[②]［yǔn］
["Guangyun" Yu Minqie, Shang Zhen, Yun. ]
"涢2" in traditional characters.
See "濜2涢".
涢
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　涢; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 641 01
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Wang divided and cut, sound cloud. Water name. [Shui Jing Zhu] Laishui, out of Dahong Mountain, southeast of Caiyang County.　Also the name of the state. [Guang Yu Ji] De'an Mansion, Yunzi State in the Spring and Autumn Period, and Zhuzhou in the later Zhou Dynasty.　[Guangyun] Yu Minqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Yu Minqie,?濜涢, the wave phase is also different. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] 溭淢濜濢.
